name: SolarPunk Farming
description:
Go back to the roots of your family and pick up the mango farming job your great great great grandparents did back in the day. In this solar punk-inspired game collect mango sell them, buy upgrades to get more mango and so on :D.

This is a solo project created by: Finn Slutter

Skybox by: GoodSky

Modular kit by: Stéphane Charré

Controls:
WASD = moving the character

Left click =  Harvesting / interact with objects

Right click = Place down objects
P/Esc = Pause
